part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slab of raw meat.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat is tough but the meal is filling.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bloody, stinking hunk of bear flesh.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It tastes awful, but it meets the bare necessities.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slab of fresh pig meat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slab of rotting boar meat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bloody, stinking hunk of barkbiter flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sticky mess of beetle flesh.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The taste is bitter and salty.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slab of mild smelling goat meat.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Would taste great salted, or smoked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slab of scorpiock meat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bloody, stinking hunk of frog meat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bloody, stinking hunk of fish meat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slab of mild smelling worm meat.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Would taste great salted, or smoked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Char coats the prismatic scales of a coiled ring of meat. It smells like an open flame.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It's tough and tastes of old rust.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It's tough and tastes of old rust.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The taste is familiar on your tongue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A triad of tonges are twined together in a fibrous twist. They gleam with a coat of saliva.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Delicious, meaty crab legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A halo of smoke surrounds an orb of calefaction.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The bowl-like scutum is scratched in the furcate patterns of an electric arc.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Air is synthesized into spacial displacement in the arciform chambers and shunted through the aether.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The gland ruptures with a pop and fills your mouth with a cold fluid. Someone else's memories seep into your own

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Nerves are raveled into a labyrinth and bundled together with limpid tissue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ageless bone was pulverized and compacted inside the scarred intestine of a bone worm.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The gland ruptures with a pop and fills your mouth with its foul fluid.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aromatic dew dampens the deflated flaps of tissue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The fluted stem of tassled yonderbrush.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A knot of bark, swollen with moisture and culled from the watervine. The gift of Agraria.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The starchy tuber of a dreadroot.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A delicious starapple, covered in countless crystalline spines. Once the spines are chipped away, the inner flesh is moist and delicious.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fracti fork at the extremities and assume a brilliant purple hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Thick stalk, plump cap. It provides shade to aphids of the right stature.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The truffle is encrusted with a wine-colored char residue born of gases unknown to the world's surfaces. Deep, deep in the earth and across the Pale Sea was it smoldered to succulence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a luminous toadstool coated in hoarfrost.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 180-220 rounds You cast light in radius 2. For the first 5 rounds after imbibing, you gain 0.6 hit points per level (minimum 3) each round. +20 cold resistance You cannot be poisoned.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Your eyes lose focus in the spongent craters of a coral moon. Is this the flesh of gods?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lah's pungent yellow-brown petals look the part of a traditional aromatic ingredient, but the savory flavor they impart is much closer to broth than tisane.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bleached cyan grave moss has grown into a rare and supple clump.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It crunches into flakes in your mouth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its spline is richly hued in ripeness, and Spindle glitter dots the peel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Children cry at the crisp snip of a yuckwheat stem, as they have for hundreds of years. They bawl, and flail, and writhe from their mothers' grasps, deaf to reassurances of the plant's medical potency. Snipped and crushed, the stem tastes acidic on their tongues and their faces contort in children's agony. But they sleep better at night, so their mothers say.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Starchy dendrites were slashed from the earth and shaved down.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Light drips off the lunes' boundaries of influence and seeps into the void.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: They're freezing with the absence of heat and light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Earth-dense juice pressures the berry skin into a perfect and light-curving sphere. Inside, a pip encodes a millionfold instruction set for the shape of shapes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Millenia of chymified metropolis that's fed the grass-coral-fungi hybrid shadow-forking in its guts are resorbed inside the seed coat of an eco wad.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Beams of snug warmth sprout like fractals inside your body.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a choice cut of laminated sponge. It jiggles to the touch.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It's chewier than anything you've eaten before.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An artifact rent from a mirror world.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It cuts your tongue open and you start to shimmer

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a crunchy and red stalk of celery.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's the rare and beautiful blossom of a jilted lover vine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Seasoning the minced meat that's trapped under the crust is a smidge of yyffur dust, shaved from the stalk of the eponymous mushroom and finely ground. The whole mushroom is much too powerful for a mammalian psyche (consuming one would obliterate the ego in mere moments), but a smidge of dust on a tasty pie can remind one of one's place in the cosmos.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It tastes bitter. Your {{Y|Ego}} is reduced by {{C|1}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A plump, ripe cucumber. It's heavier than it looks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A delicious taco, wrapped in thin paper.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cheesecloth sticks to the greasy faces of this pig cheese cuboid. For two years tiny organisms have accumulated on its surfaces, ripening it to tasty perfection.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Very chewy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sweet starapples were mashed, set over an open flame, left out to cool, and jarred for later use. Bits of stringy pulp lay suspended in the fruity aether.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The spiny fruit of fracti were mashed, set over an open flame, left out to cool, and jarred for later use. Bits of spiny pulp lay suspended in the fruity aether.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bunched wafers reaped from the moisture-sucking watervine plant and bound by twine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plucked from the dirt, they live their new lives wading in the brine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Toadstools that were cooled and dehydrated by their own hoarfrost.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plucked from a tree, they live their new lives wading in the brine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Calefaction was ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Salt has blanched the prism of colors out of the cuts of coiled meat, but a tinge of the smell of smoke remains.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chitin was shaved from the exoskeletal flank of a caught salthopper and dry-beaten to a snappy crisp.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spooled thread cut from the dual-dimensional hearth-mesh of a phase spider.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Weeks old salt crystals line the fluted valleys of a wet stalk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Weeks old salt crystals huddle in the stem's elbowed forks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Air-shunting arciforms were ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The scutum was scraped dry, smashed, and ground. Bits of the tick were squeezed of its magnetic lifeblood and vialed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dried, these thick yellow-brown petals bear a closer resemblance to meat jerky than most other flowers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Light drips off the dried lunes' boundaries of influence and seeps into the void.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ageless bone was pulverized and compacted inside the scarred intestine of a bone worm. Then it was ground into meal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Grave moss grew into a rare and supple clump, which was then crushed and placed on a spice tray.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Peeled lagroot tuber was mashed, salted, and jarred.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Moisture was baked out of fruit by the salt sun, but Spindle glitter still alights the disc-chip.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Memory-soaked nerves were ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An artifact of the mirror world was shattered and ground to fine dust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The stencil on the tin depicts an animal with claws, or are they hooves? Snoods (or horns? antlers?) pucker its nose and brow. Shaggy, knotted fur, or ruffled feathers, sheath it from the heat (or cold).

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Every autumn, many gulch dwellers hike to the Stiltgrounds to purchase the Fall wine. They return to their homes, steep wheat bran in the wine, and leaven dough in their clay ovens. A few are luckier; fungus grove dwellers need only step outside to harvest yeast, and friends to fungi need only shake their yeast-ridden appendages.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Leafy malachites and pistachios are bound by twine. Every third day or so, a leaf tics and twinges, as it still adjusts to the untoxic air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spongy foodstuff molded into a slate-hued cube of perfect proportions. What forces married the messiness of eating with the precision of cubes?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chopped tongue was soured in its own saliva and twisted around a stick.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A choice cut of laminated sponge was carved into serving slices. They jiggle to the touch.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tough, nutritious strips of barkbiter flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tough, nutritious strips of dried bear flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A strip of smoked boar flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Smoked strips of mashed beetle leg.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A smoked strip of croc flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Smoked strips of crab meat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Smoked strips of frog meat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A strip of smoked goat flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dried strips of worm segment. They smell like clay and berries.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Strips of smoked scorpiock meat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Strips of dried and smoked fish.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Mist-damp tissues were ground in a mortar, simmered in brine, and congealed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Shade oil was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blaze was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Salve was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ubernostrum was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Eaters' nectar was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hulk honey was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Skulk was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Love was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rubbergum was extracted from its injector, thickened in the acrid air, and bottled for culinary use.
